long_bio: I’m currently a full-stack Android Apps 📱 developer and have experience in full-stack Web 🌐 development. I’m an open-source enthusiast and a die-hard Linux 🐧 fan. I love to solve challenging problems, working with new technologies, and learn new things. Alhamdulillah, I’m a quick learner and good at finding bugs 🐞. Coding is my passion and hobby. My rule is to maintain all coding conventions and write self-descriptive codes. Finally, I’m friendly, group-oriented, and awesome 😎.

achievements.title: Programming Contest Participant
achievements.description: Represented IIUC in ― ACM ICPC Programming Contest 2015 - Dhaka regional as team "IIUC_traitorz".

achievements.title: ICT Tutor & Shunno Community
achievements.about: ICT Tutor is the base of Interactive ICT project. Shunno Community is a full-featured question-answer platform for students, created for Interactive ICT.
achievements.description: Project Leader and developed with "Team Shunno", which was awarded 1st Runner up in EATL Prothom Alo App Contest - 2016.

achievements.title: Volunteer Management
achievements.about: A platform for volunteers to maintain their groups and quickly get help on disaster.
achievements.description: Developed with "Team Shunno", build for disaster management category for SS12 Project Competition 2017 organized by IEEE BDS HAC.

achievements.title: Bangladesh Travel Magazine
achievements.about: A social-networking web platform for Bangladeshi travelers. The web app can suggest users where to go on a specific season based on historical data.
achievements.description: Developed with "Team Shunno", which presented in SUST Hackathon 2017.

achievements.title: Interactive ICT
achievements.about: An interactive learning app and an alternative to Computer for Inter Students. It has full-featured HTML Editor, C Compiler, SQL Simulator and Encryption Simulator. Its unique and powerful dynamic solution feature can give step by step solution of 18 types of number-system related math problem.
achievements.description: Was Project Leader and developed it with "Team Shunno", which was presented in App Development Competition at IUT 9th ICT Fest 2017 and "Team Shunno" was selected as the Champion.

achievements.title: Education Management System
achievements.about: A full-featured Education Management System for School. It has stuff-teacher-student management, attendance, automated result generation, automated promotion with roll distribution, SMS, advanced search, report generation with print etc.
achievements.description: Developed with "Team Shunno" for KDA IT. My part was designing the front-end and automate the marking, result generation, and roll generation.

achievements.title: BRG Food Delivery
achievements.about: BRG Food Delivery is a food delivery app for Barcode Restaurant Group.
achievements.description: Developed for Octoriz Pvt. Ltd. I designed the layouts, connect the app with the server APIs, implement secure token authentication and authentication related features for the App.

achievements.title: Locafie
achievements.about: Locafie is a community-driven school/university bus location sharing-tracking app. Any volunteer from a bus can share real-time bus location and others can track the bus in real-time.
achievements.description: Developed for Octoriz Pvt. Ltd. I’m the lead developer of this project. I used the Firestore database and Google Maps API to develop this real-time tracking app.
